attributes.action: Stop Rogue Private Parking / Clamping Companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our website (http://ukrights.org) has been inundated with complaints about parking fines imposed by companies such as Civil Enforcement Ltd. 

This practice is entrapment – the Government has failed in two key areas to protect the public these companies.

1.	There needs to be laws governing the issuing of such data to parties - private commercial companies should not have access.

The DVLA Scrapped their code of conduct for people accessing the DVLA Records as these companies do. WHY???

We feel that the DVLA has no business assisting a private company to issue a fine. 

2. There is no law on this matter – WHY??

The law should protect the public ensuring companies are:

a) licenced
b) Accountable

There should be tarrifs for the fines and above all a recipient should have recourse to the courts.

Unless the government steps in and takes ownership of the problem its simply going to cost the government millions of pounds in court cases .

Mr. Blair - it's time to act!
